requestBody.title: Owner creates primary location API Trace

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Tries to book herself to test the flow". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Customer Library and Access Center. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.
